channel.title: This American Life
channel.description: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. Another 1.5 million people download the weekly podcast. It is hosted by Ira Glass, produced by Chicago Public Media, delivered to stations by PRX The Public Radio Exchange, and has won all of the major broadcasting awards.
channel.copyright: Copyright 1995-2015 Chicago Public Media & Ira Glass
channel.media:copyright: Copyright 1995-2015 Chicago Public Media & Ira Glass

item.title: #467: Americans in China
item.description: It used to be that the American expats in China were the big shots. They had the money, the status, the know-how. But that's changed. What's it like to be an American living in China now? And what do they understand about China that we don't?
item.dc:creator: Chicago Public Media
